data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ryan Leonard (Millwall) has received a first yellow card.
The first-half has come to a close in London.
In the minute 45, Own goal in London! Martin Cranie scores in his own net to make it 1-0.
In the minute 60, Nathan Jones (Luton) is making a first substitution, with Joe Morrell replacing Luke Berry.
Ryan Woods is booked for the home team.
The home team have replaced Matt Smith with Scott Malone. This is the first substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
In the minute 66, Martin Cranie for Luton has been booked by Tony Harrington and receives a first yellow card.
Elliott Lee is replacing Danny Hylton for Luton at The Den.
Goal! Millwall extend their lead to 2-0 through Connor Mahoney.
In the minute 79, Ryan Leonard with an assist there.
Gary Rowett is making the team's second substitution at The Den with Kenneth Zohore replacing Mason Bennett.
Millwall make their third substitution with Ben Thompson replacing Connor Mahoney.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Matty Pearson with George Moncur.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
